title: Playground: Operation with short timeout does not complete
body:
See http://play.golang.org/p/roUpsZmwfS

In the playground I get a result like this:

    process took too long
    Program exited.

When running on my machine:

    avallee@gust:~/go/src$ time ../bin/produce 
    received a send on a spammy channel - might be doing a costly operation if not for debounce
    *****************************
    * DOING A COSTLY OPERATION! *
    *****************************
    In case you were wondering, the value passed to this function is 95120
    We could have more args to our "compiled" debounced function too, if we wanted.
    break loop
    
    real	0m0.104s
    user	0m0.109s
    sys	0m0.016s
